channel.title: 317 error[CLIENT CLOSES]
channel.description:
when ever i run any 317 client it always gives me this error:
C:\Users\Baby Allen\Desktop>java -Xmx512m -jar SilabClient.jar 0 0 highmem memb ers 0 0 20 40 60 80 100 ************** # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a2e6, pid=4556, t id=2792 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b05 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b12 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a2e6] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Baby Allen\Desktop\hs_err_pid4556.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
C:\Users\Baby Allen\Desktop>pause Press any key to continue . . .
Then the client closes after i try to move on the server, it doesnt even last 3 seconds
